title: Forum error
body:
I am trying to post something in the Player Recruitment section but it is not letting me. It says "Must be Lvl 7 or higher to post"

Problem is, I'm lvl 13.

HELP!

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Looks like you just needed a quick boards sync, which posting here automatically did for you! You should be able to freely post anywhere now.
